price: O Mary, worship your Lord devoutly, prostrate yourself and bow down with those who bow down.”
arabic: يَٰمَرۡيَمُ ٱقۡنُتِي لِرَبِّكِ وَٱسۡجُدِي وَٱرۡكَعِي مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ
